cinnamon.engine.demo

Class DemoVBOBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.gfx.GLBuffer
      • cinnamon.engine.demo.DemoVBOBuffer

  • public final class DemoVBOBuffer
extends GLBuffer

    DemoVBOBuffer helps pull out buffering operations for OpenGL drawing from the Canvas.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DemoVBOBuffer(int capacity, float[] projection)
      Constructor for a DemoVBOBuffer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBatch(Viewport.Batch batch, int offset, int length)
      Adds drawing data for one instance to the buffer.
      void clear()
      Reset the buffer to a non-written state and prepare to begin writing new drawing info from the beginning.
      void draw()
      Calls glDrawElementsInstanced(...)
      void flush()
      Pushes data from internal buffers to OpenGL.
      boolean isInstancing()
      Checks whether or not the buffer is prepared for instanced drawing .
      void setInstancing(boolean enable)
      Sets whether or not to use instanced drawing.
      void setProjection(float[] matrix)
      Sets the projection matrix to use when drawing.
      void setSources(int[] indices, float[] transforms, float[] colors, float[] coords, int[] flips)
      Sets the arrays to pull instance attributes from.
